laptops.name: Asus Vivobook Go E1504GA Intel i3-N305

laptops.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 14ALC7-999 Ryzen 3 5300U

smartphones.name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max 6.7'' 256GB Natural Titanium
smartphones.description: iPhone 15 Pro Max. Forged in titanium and featuring the groundbreaking A17 Pro chip, a customizable Action button, and the most powerful iPhone camera system ever. Get incredible framing flexibility with 7 pro lenses. Capture super high-resolution photos with more color and detail using the 48MP Main camera.

smartphones.name: Samsung Galaxy A55 5G 6.6'' Dual SIM 8GB/256GB Navy
smartphones.description: The Galaxy A55 5G features an improved, iconic design, engineered with Gorilla Victus+ to make it more resistant to damage, and a metal frame that provides an easy, intuitive grip. Furthermore, this device has three rear cameras.

smartphones.name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 13 Pro+ 5G 6.67'' Dual SIM 12GB/512GB Midnight Black
smartphones.description: The Redmi Note 13 Pro+ is not just a smartphone, it is a true design revolution that will not go unnoticed. Its finish, which is only found on premium devices, will attract attention. With a curved screen and thin metal bezels, this device feels like a jewel in your hands, and its style is undeniable.

smartphones.name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G 6.8'' Dual SIM 12GB/512GB Titanium Grey
smartphones.description: The Galaxy S24 Ultra family presents itself with an exceptional design, evolving with even smaller bezels and advanced materials, maintaining an unwavering commitment to sustainability. This ultra model redefines the standards of elegance and innovation.

smartphones.name: OnePlus 12R 5G 6.78'' Dual SIM 16GB/256GB Iron Grey
smartphones.description: The OnePlus 12R features a bold design with a luxurious camera module and anti-fingerprint matte aluminum frame. With a perfect symphony of elegance and next-level engineering, the experience is perfected.

smartphones.name: Xiaomi Redmi 13C 6.74'' Dual SIM 4GB/128GB Navy Blue
smartphones.description: With its large 6.74'' screen, the Redmi 13C provides an immersive and fluid visual experience that will leave you without looking back.

smartphones.name: Blackview BV9300 Pro 6.7'' Dual Sim 12GB/256GB Black
smartphones.description: The Blackview BV9300 Pro, is a robust smartphone that stands out for its resistance, performance and its impressive set of features, all at a very affordable price. Designed to meet the needs of the average user, this smartphone is ready to exceed all expectations.

smartphones.name: Motorola Moto G73 6.5'' Dual SIM 8GB/256GB Midnight Blue
smartphones.description: Moto G73 5G equipped with the powerful MediaTek Dimensity 930 processor brings up to 30% faster performance. Easily switch between your apps with 8GB of memory and enjoy smooth gaming, lag-free videos and better camera performance. You can also download at ultra-fast 5G speeds without worrying about battery life.

smartphones.name: Apple iPhone 14 6.1'' 256GB Starlight
smartphones.description: The iPhone 14 incorporates the most impressive camera system ever on an Apple smartphone. It also has the greatest autonomy ever, a processor that is increasingly adapted to you, very important innovations in terms of security, and a sensational Super Retina XDR screen, which allows you to enjoy your favorite content in the best possible quality.

smartphones.name: Samsung Galaxy A34 5G 6.6'' Dual SIM 8GB/256GB Lima
smartphones.description: The Galaxy A34 5G was designed with the environment in mind with premium finishes for a better user experience and comfort.
